messageBody:
--- "Chappell, Simon P" <simon.chappell@...> wrote:
> I read the fine manual and here's what I came up with that works.
> Please advise if this could be better...

One change:

> PrintStream oldOut = System.out;
> ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream(256);
> PrintStream ps = new PrintStream(baos);
> System.setOut(ps);
>
> <call to program that generates output>
>
// To catch any unflushed data
ps.flush();
> String s = baos.toString();
> assertEquals("<some string that I expect>", s);
> System.setOut(oldOut);

For pedantic purposes, I might make all of the variables "final". I
also might drop the ps variable and just setOut(new PrintStream(baos)).

Regards,

Rob
